{big: (data:skin.vars.config_ratio_post ? resizeImage(data:img,900,"16:9") : resizeImage(data:img,900)), medium: (data:skin.vars.config_ratio_post ? resizeImage(data:img,500,"1:1") : resizeImage(data:img,500)), small: (data:skin.vars.config_ratio_post ? resizeImage(data:img,380,"16:9") : resizeImage(data:img,300))}

a.expr:href: params("//www.tumblr.com/widgets/share/tool/preview",{canonicalUrl: data:post.url.canonical, caption: data:post.snippets.short, posttype: "link", title: data:post.title})
